name: Summer Camp
description: Aventuras is excited to offer Spanish Immersion in-person Summer Camps in San Francisco in June, July and August. No Spanish language experience or knowledge is required, beginners are welcome. Just like our After School Program, our "Verano de Aventuras" is based on Experiential Learning and offers -each week- a combination of fun and interactive activities in the areas of visual arts, STEM, music & movement, mindfulness, and culture & community. ​- Hours are 9:30 am - 4:30 pm. - Early Care:
